articles.body: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the days top trending stock tickers, including Amazon AMZN seeking to raise $12 billion through a US bond sale, Chinese EV maker XPeng XPEV, 9868.HK published revenue outlook that fell below Wall Streets expectations, and Netflix NFLX stock is currently trading after its 10-for-1 stock split.
